column1: Smoque BBQ////Fries: The reason I give this place a 4.5 and not 5. Okay
column3: but if you're gonna go to the trouble of eating one of the most unhealthy things on the planet
column4: why not season it up a bit? I like that there are places popping like Edzo's Burger Shack that doll up the fries. But maybe it's just that I don't really see the point in plain fries...
